import React, { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import './login.css' import faceicon from '../images/facebook.webp' import google from '../images/google.png' import git from '../images/github.png' const Login = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [senha, setSenha] = useState('') const [response, setResponse] = useState('') function submit(e) { e.preventDefault() axios.post('http://localhost:3001/login', { email: email, senha: senha }).then((response) => { if (response.data === 'EMAIL OU SENHA INVALIDOS') { setResponse(response.data) } else { localStorage.setItem('token', true) localStorage.setItem('IdAluno', response.data) navigate('/aluno/portal') console.log('ok') } }) } return (
SIGEN

Faça login para continuar

{ setEmail(e.target.value) }} required className="inputemail" placeholder="Insira seu email" /> { setSenha(e.target.value) }} required className="inputsenha" placeholder="Senha" />
